name: PagerDuty AI Incident Commander
description: AI-powered incident management agent that orchestrates incident response, automates stakeholder communication, and coordinates on-call teams for faster resolution

skills.name: Automated Incident Declaration
skills.description: Automatically declare incidents based on alert thresholds, patterns, and correlated signals from monitoring tools
examples: Should this alert pattern trigger an incident?
Declare P1 incident for payment outage
Assess if alerts warrant incident declaration

skills.name: Responder Mobilization
skills.description: Identify and mobilize the right responders based on service ownership, escalation policies, and availability

skills.name: Stakeholder Communication
skills.description: Generate and distribute incident status updates to stakeholders, customers, and leadership with appropriate detail levels

skills.name: Incident Timeline Reconstruction
skills.description: Automatically reconstruct incident timeline from alerts, communications, and actions for post-incident analysis
examples: Identify key events leading to outage

skills.name: Post-Incident Report Generation
skills.description: Generate comprehensive post-incident reports with timeline, impact analysis, root cause, and action items

skills.name: Similar Incident Matching
skills.description: Find similar past incidents to accelerate diagnosis and suggest proven remediation approaches
examples: Find similar incidents from past 90 days
What resolved this type of issue before?
Match current symptoms to known issues
